title: Establish a Digital Operational Resilience Testing Programme
description: As a financial entity (excluding microenterprises), I need to establish, maintain, and review a sound and comprehensive digital operational resilience testing programme as part of our ICT risk-management framework, in order to assess preparedness for handling ICT-related incidents, identify weaknesses, and implement corrective measures.

title: Incorporate Assessments and Tools into the Testing Programme
description: As a financial entity, I want our digital operational resilience testing programme to include a range of assessments, tests, methodologies, practices, and tools that comply with Articles 25 and 26, so that we can effectively evaluate our digital resilience.

title: Follow a Risk-Based Approach for Testing
description: As a financial entity (excluding microenterprises), I need to follow a risk-based approach when conducting our digital operational resilience testing, considering the evolving ICT risk landscape and specific risks to our entity, to ensure the criticality of information assets and services provided are adequately protected.

title: Ensure Independent Testing
description: As a financial entity (excluding microenterprises), I want to ensure that our resilience tests are conducted by independent parties, either internal or external, with dedicated resources and conflict of interest avoidance, to maintain the integrity of the test design and execution.

title: Establish Procedures for Issue Management
description: As a financial entity (excluding microenterprises), I need to establish procedures and policies to prioritize, classify, and remedy issues revealed during testing, and to validate internally that all identified weaknesses are fully addressed.

title: Conduct Annual Tests on ICT Systems
description: As a financial entity (excluding microenterprises), I must ensure that appropriate tests are conducted at least yearly on all ICT systems and applications supporting critical or important functions, to maintain continuous operational resilience.
